title: Don’t Mess with the Tough Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Time Skip
author: 紫晶水凌
description: She used to be an empress, but was set up by someone close to her and ended up dead. Her husband betrayed her, her father framed her and her sister took everything that belonged to her. She died with regrets. When she was reborn, time had gone back to twenty years ago. With her step mother in charge, her life was difficult. She swore to take revenge and learned medicines and poisons before she went back to the old house. Unexpectedly, she met a good-looking Prince who was treating her with a sincere heart and wanted to protect her from harm...>
